Topic.Title: Importing and Cutting and Pasting objects such as pictures

Posts.EditableText: Hi I am a new user, and would like to know the procedures for importing, and cutting and pasting objects from outside sources; such as art created in programs such-as Director MX; the Internet or any other outside sources.
Posts.HTML:
Hi

I am a new user, and would like to know the procedures for importing, and cutting and pasting objects from outside sources; such as art created in programs such-as Director MX; the Internet or any other outside sources.

Posts.EditableText: explain in more detail what it is you're trying to do with QuestNet here...
Posts.HTML: explain in more detail what it is you're trying to do with QuestNet here...

Posts.EditableText: Quest can only support some file format. You should read the doc about that. I don't think director mx kind of file are supported (in short you can use jpg, gif, probably png, midi, mod, mp3, and maybe avi and some video format)
Posts.HTML: Quest can only support some file format. You should read the doc about that. I don't think director mx kind of file are supported (in short you can use jpg, gif, probably png, midi, mod, mp3, and maybe avi and some video format)
